overview.en: Ledou Chain is a corporate virtual currency launched by Shenyang Jingshun Network Technology Co., Ltd., which is mainly used as a token for commodity trading, and is applied to the online shopping mall - Ledou Mall, which is developed by the company itself. It replaces the settlement function of the legal currency in the process of commodity trading, so that the payment system of our mall can be created with high degree of freedom, which can ultimately solve the fraud problem in the transaction process.
overview.zh: 乐豆链是由沈阳景顺网络科技有限公司推出的企业虚拟币，主要用途是作为商品交易时的代币使用，应用于本公司自己开发的网上商城-乐豆商城。它代替了法币行使商品交易过程中的结算功能，从而使我们商城的支付体系可以高自由度打造，能终极解决交易过程中的欺诈问题。
